Package com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.helper

Class TaxonomyClassHelper

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.helper.TaxonomyClassHelper
@Component
public class TaxonomyClassHelper
extends java.lang.Object
Contains methods to validate a given taxonomy class.

    • toAppVersionTaxonomyClassDto

      public static AppVersionTaxonomyClassDto toAppVersionTaxonomyClassDto​(AppVersionTaxonomyClass appVersionTaxonomyClass)
      Converts an AppVersionTaxonomyClass to a AppVersionTaxonomyClassDto.
      Parameters:
      appVersionTaxonomyClass - the given app version taxonomy class
      Returns:
      the converted dto, if the given app version taxonomy class is not null;
      null otherwise

    • averageScore

      public static ScoreDto averageScore​(AndroidAppVersion appVersion)
      Calculates the average CUSL score. In the future the weight of the taxonomy classes should be respected.
      Parameters:
      appVersion - android app version
      Returns:
      the average CUSL score for the given app version

    • validate

      public static java.util.Optional<TaxonomyClass> validate​(AppVersionTaxonomyClassEventDto appVersionTaxonomyClassEventDto)
      validates the given taxonomy class
      Parameters:
      appVersionTaxonomyClassEventDto - the representation of the taxonomy class
      Returns:
      the Optional<TaxonomyClass> object, if the class is valid and exists; creates and saves a new taxonomy class if the class is valid but does not exists;
      Optional.empty(), otherwise

    • validateCategory

      private static org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.ImmutablePair<java.lang.Boolean,​Category> validateCategory​(java.lang.Long categoryId)
      validates the given category
      Parameters:
      categoryId - the category id
      Returns:
